CustomField.description: We have a check box field called Public on Amazon in our S3-File object. This field is being used to make file public on Amazon S3 and provide an AWS link for the file which never expires. By default "Public on Amazon" will be false for all files uploaded by S3-Link. But if you want to change it to true, you can check this checkbox.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: We have a check box field called Public on Amazon in our S3-File object. This field is being used to make file public on Amazon S3 and provide an AWS link for the file which never expires. By default "Public on Amazon" will be false for all files uploaded by S3-Link. But if you want to change it to true, you can check this checkbox.
CustomField.label: Default Public on Amazon
